      • getFilledLabels

        public static org.opencv.core.Mat[] getFilledLabels​(java.lang.String path)
        Get the labels filled and separated in two Help from : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/48421541/how-to-draw-a-fill-shape-in-opencv

        path - path to the JSON file
        Returns:
        an array, the first element is the ellipse filled and the second the glass filled
